snippet.title: Ghost In The Mirror: Episode 1 - Here Be Dragons
snippet.description:
Hello adventurer, and welcome to Ghost In The Mirror.
The first story I want to tell you takes us back in time, to a distant epoch when explorers embarked on daring journeys to unknown lands.

A time where our knowledge of the world was still limited, and maps were very different from what we have today.

Amid uncertain borders and uncharted places, detailed illustrations of terrifying creatures stood out.

In regions where the journey turned treacherous, a warning inked in blood sent shivers down sailors' spines... 
Beware, for "Here Be Dragons"!
